statements: SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT student_id, classroom_id, date FROM Attendance WHERE attended = true;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE classroom_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT student_id, classroom_id, date FROM Attendance WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM Attendance;
SELECT date, student_id, attended FROM Attendance WHERE classroom_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM Attendance GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY total_attendance DESC
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE student_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654321' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT classroom_id FROM Attendance
SELECT * FROM Attendance ORDER BY classroom_id ASC, date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM StudentAttendance WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT student_id, attendance_date, in_time FROM StudentAttendance WHERE attendance_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT student_id, class_id, attendance_date FROM StudentAttendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT student_id, class_id FROM StudentAttendance
SELECT participation_date, participation_level FROM ClassroomParticipation WHERE class_id = 101
SELECT * FROM StudentAttendance WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, attendance_date, in_time FROM StudentAttendance WHERE student_id = 2 AND class_id = 101 ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(student_id) AS number_of_attendances FROM StudentAttendance GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(student_id) > 5;
SELECT sa.student_id, sa.attendance_date, cp.participation_level FROM StudentAttendance sa INNER JOIN ClassroomParticipation cp ON sa.student_id = cp.student_id AND sa.class_id = cp.class_id;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS number_of_students, AVG(TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(out_time, in_time))) AS avg_time_spent FROM StudentAttendance GROUP BY class_id HAVING AVG(TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(out_time, in_time))) > 3600;
SELECT * FROM Student;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM Student ORDER BY class_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Student WHERE attendance = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Class WHERE class_name = 'Math';
SELECT student_name, date FROM Student, Attendance WHERE Student.student_id = Attendance.student_id AND Attendance.attended = TRUE ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Student WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM Student s JOIN Class c ON s.class_id = c.class_id GROUP BY class_name;
SELECT student_name, class_name, date FROM Student s JOIN Attendance a ON s.student_id = a.student_id JOIN Class c ON s.class_id = c.class_id ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT s.student_name, c.class_name, a.date, a.attended FROM Student s JOIN Attendance a ON s.student_id = a.student_id JOIN Class c ON s.class_id = c.class_id WHERE a.attended = TRUE;
SELECT student_id, MAX(date) AS latest_attendance_date FROM Attendance GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT course_name, course_credit_hours FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT classroom_name, classroom_capacity FROM VirtualClassrooms WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, attendance_date, attendance_status FROM Attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_credit_hours, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_credit_hours > 3;
SELECT student_name, attendance_date, attendance_status FROM Students INNER JOIN Attendance ON Students.student_id = Attendance.student_id;
SELECT classroom_name, course_name, classroom_capacity FROM VirtualClassrooms INNER JOIN Courses ON VirtualClassrooms.course_id = Courses.course_id ORDER BY classroom_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, attendance_status FROM students WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM classes WHERE class_id = 3;
SELECT student_id, attendance_date, is_present FROM attendance WHERE student_id = 5;
SELECT report_id, student_id, participation_score FROM reports WHERE participation_score > 90;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, attendance_status FROM students WHERE class_id = 2;
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM classes WHERE class_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, class_name FROM students JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id;
SELECT student_name, report_date, participation_score FROM students JOIN reports ON students.student_id = reports.student_id;
